name: Hot Streak
description: All players gain +5 offense for this game.

name: Lockdown
description: All players gain +5 defense for this game.

name: Floor General
description: Point Guard gains +10 playmaking and +5 chemistry.

name: Sixth Man Spark
description: Your 6th man gains +10 offense and +10 athleticism.

name: Clutch Time
description: All players gain +7 clutch for this game.

name: Team Chemistry
description: All players gain +5 chemistry for this game.

name: Wild Card
description: You may play any player at any position for this game.

name: Trade Deadline
description: Swap one player from your team with one player from the CPU's team before the game.

name: Position Redraft
description: Completely redraft all players at a specific position of your choice before the game.
